result.eng: We will have to pay the funeral costs.
result.ga: Beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íoc
result.orig: Beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íoc
result.html: Beidh orainn costas na sochraide a íocWe will have to pay the funeral costs.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ orainn costas na soċraide a íocWe will have to pay the funeral costs.

result.eng: The accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.
result.ga: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muid
result.orig: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muid
result.html: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muidThe accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a ċeap muidThe accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.

result.eng: The politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ga: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.orig: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.html: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ na polaiteoirí gearraḋ siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.
